question: Which of the following clearly define Pyrilla?
option3: A character of ancient Greek mythology
option4: A building heated by solar energy
explanation: Adult Pyrilla perpusilla is a pale tawny-yellow, soft-bodied insect with head prominently drawn forward to form a snout. Both adults and nymphs are very active and suck sap from the leaves of sugarcane. On the slightest disturbance, they jump from leaf to leaf.
